title: Drawing, 1805
medium: Pen and black ink, graphite on paper
markings: On verso, in black ink, lower right: Cooper Union stamp: MUSEUM / FOR THE / ARTS OF / DECORATION / COOPER UNION (Lugt 457c); watermark: I / C / H
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: A female genius is shown turned toward left and holding a wreath over a trophy of arms. A trumpet is in her left hand. Division marks in graphite.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, 1805.Pen and black ink, graphite on paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3252.
